flawed_nl_solution:
30% of Mars is made up of other elements because 100 - 50 - 20 = <<100-50-20=30>>30
Mars weighs 500.0 tons because 150 / 0.3 = <<150/0.3=500.0>>500.0
The moon weighs 520.0 tons because 500.0 / 2 = <<500.0/2=520.0>>520.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 250.0, not 520.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
